basic.description: For performance majors. Private instruction. Major instrument. May be repeated to a maximum of twenty-four semester hours. Credit for MVO 6460r (2) is available for all instruments.
basic.subject: MVB
basic.title: Applied Music Major, Tuba

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Admission to MV(B, K, O, P, S, V, W) 6460r–6469r series by qualifying audition.
